param.name: command
param.label: Command to Run
param.help: Type in the command to run on the remote resource

param.name: max_time
param.label: Maximum Time
param.help: The command is canceled if it is not completed within this time limit after submission to the resource

param.name: jobschedulertype
param.label: Select Controller, SLURM Partition or PBS Queue
param.help: Job will submitted using SSH, sbatch or qsub, respectively

param.name: scheduler_directives_slurm
param.label: Scheduler directives
param.help: e.g. --partition=compute;--tasks-per-node=1 - Use the semicolon character ; to separate parameters. Do not include the SBATCH keyword.

param.name: scheduler_directives_pbs
param.label: Scheduler directives
param.help: e.g. -l mem=1000;-l nodes=1:ppn=4 - Use the semicolon character ; to separate parameters. Do not include the PBS keyword.
